name: obstructionist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
intentionally trying to stop or slow down an official process: obstructionist policies/tactics They have accused the other party of being obstructionist. See
obstructionism
More examplesFewer examplesShe didn't want to be obstructionist.He called them obstructionist for delaying the decision.Environmental groups have used obstructionist tactics.
